snippet: Arkansas' highest court on Wednesday struck down a state law that requires voters to show photo identification before casting a ballot, ruling the requirement unconstitutional just days before early voting begins....

headline.print_headline: Arkansas High Court Strikes Down Voter ID Law
headline.main: Arkansas High Court Strikes Down Voter ID Law

lead_paragraph: Arkansas' highest court on Wednesday struck down a state law that requires voters to show photo identification before casting a ballot, ruling the requirement unconstitutional just days before early voting begins.
